data.persona: I am a sailor who sits on boats. I have a wife and three children. I try to avoid drinking too much.
data.description:
You are in the Warehouses.
The warehouses are the largest structures in the port, rising well above the adjoining buildings. Constructed from virgin timber, the beams overhead support lofts that are filled to capacity with boxes, crates, and barrels full of goods from all over the world. Carefully checking each parcel that crosses the doorway, the warehouse manager knows exactly where everything belongs inside.
The traveler is here.

You are carrying a compass and a map, wearing an eye patch, and wielding a Kings sword.

            "extra_desc": "The warehouse manager wasn't always an anxious man, but last year, some foreign sailors raided the warehouse and stole twelve casks of the finest rum. data.short_motivation: I want to steal valuable goods from this port before the traveler can.
data.mid_motivation: I need to smuggle as much as I can onto a nearby ship and return home quickly to feed my family.
data.long_motivation: I would like to be an honest sailor one day and not someone who has to steal to feed his family.

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: follow the traveler into the shipyard, where I see him starting to steal the same goods I want to steal.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: hit the traveler with the king's sword and take his haul.

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: go the shore to find my boat to fill it with my loot. I can't tell which boat is mine with only one eye. My better eye is weak and my covered eye is even weaker, but I need them both to see which boat is mine. They all look the same.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: go the next port to rob another shipment.

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: steal another shipment from a group of absent traders.

timeline.label: 4 hours from now
timeline.action: go my hometown to begin trading everything that I have stolen in exchange for money and food to feed my family.
